get ready to keep your little one warm and adorable this season with our amazing autumn wheat child crochet sweater! want the full autumn wheat collection? click on the link below.

our crochet pattern comes with a helpful video tutorial, making it super easy to follow along. and the best part? it's available in sizes baby to 12 years, so everyone can enjoy the coziness.

join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and get ready for an exciting crochet-along journey. don't miss out on this opportunity to create stunning pieces for the upcoming chilly months!

but here's what sets this sweater apart: it's crocheted flat, making it perfect for beginners. get comfy and stylish with us today!

✨ what size can i make this sweater? ✨

✔️ cute child sweater - 11 sizes: baby to 12 years
this is a cuff-to-cuff sweater crocheted flat. we will start with making the ribbing for one cuff, work the sleeve and increase, then crochet the first section of the body, the front & back sections to make room for the neck, the second part of the body, then the second sleeve while decreasing, and then the final cuff. this only needs two seams to become a sweater!

✨ extra support & tips: ✨
✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube
✔️ join a community of crocheters
✔️ sweater schematic
✔️ diagram to guide you through each section.

✨ what you will need to make this sweater ✨
yarn:
[wecrochet upcycle worsted][1]- 33% alpaca, 34% wool, 33% acrylic, 219yds/100g
colorway shown: sage
weight: 4 worsted
yarn quantities
250 (275, 325, 400, 475) (600, 750, 800, 875, 950) yds
2 (2, 2, 2, 3) (3, 4, 4, 5) balls
yarn substitutions listed in pattern.

notions:
[scissors][2]
[yarn needle][3]
[removable stitch marker][4]

crochet hook:
[h (5.0mm) crochet hook][5]

✨ hey, i'm briana k! ✨
join the autumn-inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience! we'll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection.

i've designed this collection to be fun and easy, with only 1-2 seams required. you'll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces. make them for yourself or as gifts. i've enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season.

get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style. join me, and let's crochet together!
